resources.string: Navigate to your Dropbox folder(above) on your PC. Drag and drop spreadsheets into the folder "spreadsheets" and templates into the folder "templates".

If sync is enabled, any spreadsheets or templates you create/edit/scan will automatically be synced to the cloud. If you have Dropbox installed on your PC, you will also receive real-time notifications as you update your spreadsheets/templates.
InventoryScan Pro and InventoryScan Free are copyright Dribble Apps. If you liked InventoryScan Free, please consider upgrading to InventoryScan Pro to support the developers.

We\'d like to acknowledge the following companies/individuals for making this app possible: Google - for the Android OS, Amazon - for the App Store, dm77 and zbar for their barcodescanner library released under the Apache License 2.0 and jExcelApi by Andy Khan released under the LGPL license. The Apache License is available here: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0. The LGPL License is available here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html.
If you are having trouble with the app, wish to report bugs or make feature requests please email our support at dribbleau@gmail.com. We will reply as soon as possible.
